content: crochet pattern to make your own approximately life sized rat available in three pdf files one using american one british crochet terminology and the other german some experience of making amigurumi animals is advised to make your rat you will need to be able to work in a continuous spiral slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet in british terms half_double_crochet half treble in british terms single_crochet decrease double_crochet decrease in british terms crochet through front loop only there are many photographs to help with making your rat you are welcome to sell items you make from my pattern
